entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
